Author: paperklipp
Text: I catch people staring at me in public *constantly*, and while it always low-grade bothers me, I don’t *really* mind when it’s women because I get it, I stare at other women too, and it’s usually either a body comparison or wondering where they got that jacket or whatever. But I *haaaaaate* when I catch men staring at me. I’m severely underweight and the idea of them sexualising me, even now, turns my stomach. Like fuck off you dick-focused fucking creep, what about my sickly childsize appearance is turning you on, exactly?
